channel.title: Has anyone heard of one of these?
channel.description:
I was going to write a quick sucky program to solve algebra shit and show the work by just typing in the equation. But i was wondering if something like this already exists? It would make everything i already know alot easier by not wasting my time on problems.
The whole point of it is to show the work so i can get points for the answer.

item.title: Has anyone heard of one of these?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Too late now, a new semester is about to start and its all about art for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Has anyone heard of one of these?
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

I recommend the bagatrix algebra 2 solver. It should be up in torrents if your looking for it. It shows both detailed explanation and step by step well steps on how to solve such equations. It has Algebra, Geometry, Graphing, and Calculus.

Read full topic

item.title: Has anyone heard of one of these?
item.dc:creator: @akl akl
item.description:
@akl wrote:

cooper:

i remember a program i downloaded a few years ago named “ultimate math solver” or something similar, it would explain and show all of the work for any equation you gave it.

http://www.umsolver.com/

it’s a nice program, thought i havent tried it, here’s a screenie: http://www.umsolver.com/cgi-bin/club.pl?file=ur01&language=us

item.source: Has anyone heard of one of these?

item.title: Has anyone heard of one of these?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:5, topic:315724”][quote author=Davidude link=topic=412189.msg3038723#msg3038723 date=1258930684]

I was going to write a quick sucky program to solve algebra shit and show the work by just typing in the equation. But i was wondering if something like this already exists? It would make everything i already know alot easier by not wasting my time on problems.

The whole point of it is to show the work so i can get points for the answer.

Umm maybe take a look at http://www.wolframalpha.com/ ? Might be what you are looking for.
[/quote]
Close, i also need to be able to solve things like substitution etc Which involves 2 equations. And it doesn’t really show the work =[/quote]
if you’re going to do things like show work then do it in parts, so say you have an eqautaion that has two steps to solve have the first box display the equation get the second box to display part of the equation being solved and then show the answer so you can show how it was done.
like for example:
x^2 + y^2 =25 and you need to find the centre
box1: (X-A)^2+(Y-B)^2=r^2 as this is the forumla you would work on
box2: (X-0)^2+(Y-0)^2=25
centre point = (0,0)
just display stages of the equation being done

Read full topic

[/quote]
Umm maybe take a look at http://www.wolframalpha.com/ ? Might be what you are looking for.[/quote]
